programme.title: Kumar Vs The World - EP 2
programme.desc: Singapore’s birth rates are dropping faster than your phone battery. But why? Kumar explores money, stress and changing priorities with hilarious truths, shocking stats, a celebrity gameshow and panel discussion on parenthood. Are we running out of Singaporeans? And can we fix it? It’s Kumar VS Children!

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4 - EP 17
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure - EP 2
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. Featuring videos of the most extreme and destructive weather conditions, firsthand accounts, and professional meteorologists sharing tales from the front lines, viewers get to experience the fury of Mother Nature.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day - EP 2
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

Juleha becomes suspicious and it turns out that the pickpocket is indeed targeting Diana. Finally, Juleha helps Diana from the pickpocket. With gratitude, Diana appoints Juleha as a personal assistant to Chelsea (Debi Sagita), Diana's daughter. Juleha also gets an official residence and a private car while working as a personal assistant.

They have been dating for a year, Dion is ready to propose and marry Leyla. But Leyla is not ready to marry again, because she is still traumatized by marriage. One day, Leyla meets Bima (Kano Weidner), her ex-husband, Bima explains that he left her because he is looking for work abroad.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 19
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KAPAN NIKAH? VS DOAIN AJA
programme.desc: Jana (Glenca Chysara) and Jeni (Ina Marika) are two sisters with different personalities. Jana is a tomboy and works as a car mechanic. Meanwhile, Jeni is a girl who likes to dress up, hang out, and is feminine. The two swap bodies after being electrocuted. Meanwhile, Rafi (Fendy Chow) is Jeni's boyfriend. There is turmoil of love and feelings between the two sisters.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 39
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: POV Punya Pacar Semanis Kamu
programme.desc: Alexa (Larasati Nugroho) is still in a relationship with her fiancé. However, it turns out he's having an affair behind her back. Strangely, Alexa ends up having a relationship with her driver, Bram (Lavicky Nicholas). So what will happen to Alexa's love life, given that her relationships are often frowned upon?

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: KALO JULEHA MENDADAK TAJIR
programme.desc: Juleha (Angelica Simperler) works as a security guard with Joni (Cakrawala Airawan) at Diana's office. One night, a motorcycle follows Diana home from work. Juleha becomes suspicious and it turns out that the pickpocket is indeed targeting Diana. Finally, Juleha helps Diana from the pickpocket. With gratitude, Diana appoints Juleha as a personal assistant to Chelsea (Debi Sagita), Diana's daughter. Juleha also gets an official residence and a private car while working as a personal assistant.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 39
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Cuma Pura Pura Mencintaimu, Bercyndyaaa!
programme.desc: Aldo (Kiki Farrel) has to find a new boarding house after being kicked out by the boarding house owner, the father of Riska (Angie Ang), his ex. However, suddenly Dila (Jennifer Eve), Riska's sister, claims Aldo is her boyfriend. Finally, in order to stay in the boarding house, Aldo has to pretend to be dating Dila.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 493
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: JODOHKU DI BENGKEL MOTOR
programme.desc: Dea is a girl whose hobby is riding a dirt bike. Because of her reckless driving on the road, Dea hit another motorcyclist named Gilang. Gilang was angry with Dea because of her arrogant nature. Gilang finally confiscated Dea's motorbike key. If Dea wanted her motorbike key back, Gilang told her to get it at the motorbike repair shop where Gilang worked.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 20
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: Aku Butuh Ayang Walau Tuhan Maha Penyayang
programme.desc: Naya takes care of a man named Leo (Rizky Fachrel) who can't walk due to an accident during illegal motorcycle racing. Leo's mother said that Leo is an introverted child and has no friends. She asked Naya to be comfortable taking care of Leo. Naya told Leo's mother that she would take care of and help Leo until Leo could recover. Naya diligently takes care of Leo, helping him during physiotherapy. Unexpectedly, Leo likes Naya.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 40
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Senyum Neng Yang Bikin Gula Cepet Abis
programme.desc: It is said that Fahri (Erdin Werdrayana) has just returned from traveling to the city. He wants to meet his girlfriend Tiara in the village. However, it turns out that Tiara is engaged to a handsome, rich man, and the girl even said that her future husband will soon become the village head. Then from there, Fahri, who feels hurt and resentful because he has been betrayed, becomes obsessed with becoming the village head. Fahri asks for help from a beautiful girl who owns a grocery store.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 494
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Opah Popular - EP 9
programme.desc: Badrul dan Sofia bertugas di luar negara dan menghabiskan cuti dengan balik ke kampung. Anaknya mereka dipaksa untuk tinggal bersama opah.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 19
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Jep & Judin - EP 11
programme.desc: Jep dan Judin adik-beradik tiri yang lurus bendul meminati sukan bermotor. Jep mahu jadi Johan Rempit dan Judin mahu menolongnya mencapai mimpi itu.

programme.title: Hairul Hanis Junior - EP 7
programme.desc: Ikuti perjalanan Hanis Zalikha dan Hairul Azreen berkongsi detik manis menyambut kelahiran anak pertama mereka, Yusuf Iskandar.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 4
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Kiah Pekasam - EP 9
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Kiah yang sangat jujur di dalam percakapannya memulakan kehidupan baru di kampungnya.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 8
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 8

programme.desc: Kisah Mimi seorang gadis yang cantik menawan bekerja di sebuah pasaraya ingin segera mencari pasangan hidup walaupun terpaksa buntu memilih di antara dua orang adik-beradik.

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok - EP 14
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.desc: Artis-artis tempatan akan bertarung dalam beberapa cabaran kecergasan yang akan menguji daya mental dan fizikal mereka.

programme.title: Muka Buku - EP 5
programme.desc: Muka Buku ialah rancangan permainan meneka, di mana selebriti perlu meneka antara empat peserta, siapa yang palsu dan siapa Muka Buku Sebenar

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2022 - EP 10
programme.desc: Sepahtu kembali menghiburkan anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa - EP 3
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Yem Rempit - EP 5
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom mengisahkan kehidupan Yem membahagikan masa antara isteri, mertua, kerjaya dan juga rakan-rakan. Semuanya dilakonkan di restoran bapa mertuanya.

programme.title: Kampung Boy S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Nostalgia kehidupan di kampung dirakamkan dalam siri animasi Kampung Boy dengan pelbagai watak yang menarik disulami dengan pelbagai peristiwa lucu dan menghiburkan.

programme.title: Kiah The Spy - EP 1
programme.desc: Kiah membina kumpulan baru untuk menguruskan perniagaan Ikan Pekasamnya,dia juga dilatih dan dilantik menjadi seorang ejen rahsia.

programme.title: Awak Suka Saya Tak? - EP 1
programme.desc: Intan mencintai Hilman Yong, Sejak kemalangan berlaku Hilman hilang menjadi Damien Yong. Kini Intan terpaksa menyayangi bekas suaminya dari jauh dan menunggu Hilman kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: My Little Heroes - Yusuf & Bujibu - EP 7
programme.desc: Kenali dunia Yusuf dan Bujibu sebagai adik beradik serta bagaimana Hairul & Hanis apabila bersama kedua ‘anak’ mereka dalam menjalani aktiviti harian.

programme.title: Berita Hangit - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa komedi yang dilakonkan oleh pelawak -pelawak dan pelakon terbaik Malaysia seperti Zizan , Afdlin , Khir Rahman , Marsha . Jangan lupa saksikan komedi ini yang sesuai ditonton bersama keluarga , Pastinya gelak di Astro Warna

programme.title: Temasya Sukan Kelaut - EP 5
programme.desc: Program sukan yang diselitkan elemen komedi dengan menampilkan barisan pelawak tanah air serta barisan selebriti sukan terkenal.

programme.title: Tabung Gelak Warna - EP 27
programme.desc: Himpunan petikan terbaik dari semua rancangan di Astro Warna dan segmen alih bahasa dari petikan telenovela yang di alih bahasa oleh pelakon komedi tempatan

programme.title: Potong - EP 1
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang pemuda Midun, yang kini menyambung legasi perkhidmatan berkhatan tradisional peninggalan arwah bapanya, seorang Tok Mudim handal di kampung.

programme.title: Dapur Chef Ammar - EP 7
programme.desc: Saksikan kehebatan dan kepakaran Chef Ammar dalam menyediakan pelbagai hidangan masakan dan makanan ala Arab yang lazat lagi penuh berkhasiat ini.

programme.title: Jihan Show S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Riuh rendah dibuatnya apabila Jihan berkumpul dengan teman-teman. Pelbagai topik jadi perbualan bila semua "girlfriends" bersatu.

programme.title: Meja Bulat Sepahtu - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara santai yang di hos kan oleh Sepahtu dengan pelbagai topik menarik dan terkini.

programme.title: Yem Rempit - EP 5

programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan " Stand Up Comedy " gabungan antara Malaysia dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Onyomat Geset Go - EP 5
programme.desc: 12 pelawak menjelajah Malaysia dan hanya seorang juara yang bakal memenangi hadiah lumayan.

programme.title: Redah Kasi Pecah Ekstravaganza - EP 4
programme.desc: Rancangan berbentuk permainan dan jelajah meredah kampung-kampung bersama selebriti-selebriti sambil melakukan pelbagai aktiviti bersama.

programme.title: My Little Heroes - Yusuf & Bujibu - EP 7
programme.desc: Kenali dunia Yusuf dan Bujibu sebagai adik beradik serta bagaimana Hairul & Hanis apabila bersama kedua ‘anak’ mereka dalam menjalani aktiviti harian.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 8
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat anda…mungkin?

programme.title: Mega Spontan - EP 2
programme.desc: Saksikan 4 kumpulan selebriti bertanding dan bermain permainan spontan bagi merebut gelaran Juara.

programme.title: Prankap Show - EP 2
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular merancang "prank" bersama geng mereka dan mengenakan mangsa terpilih. Berjayakan perancangan "prank" mereka? Sama-sama kita nantikan!

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 5
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin & Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: Tai Tai Berkecai - EP 2
programme.desc: Azlan Martins dikenali sebagai lelaki yang paling dihormati di negara ini. The Martins Ladies, isterinya, dan dua anak perempuan terkenal dengan gaya hidup mewah mereka.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 54
programme.desc: Zayn mahu kepastian yang Dr Farhan akan menjaga Lia dan Ian dengan baik. Eyra diculik oleh sekumpulan samseng yang mahu menuntut hutang. Kak Pah mula mengesyaki Maria ada agenda tersendiri.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 11

programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Nandhini
programme.desc: Nandini is a supernatural drama series. The story is about a rich influential family haunted by a snake's curse and how a good spirit helps the family from the snake by its supernatural powers.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - VELAI ILLA PATTATHARI-2
programme.desc: When Raghuvaran, a civil engineer, declines a job offer from Vasundhara, a businesswoman, she makes it her mission to trouble him. However, he takes matters into his own hands to teach her a lesson.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - VELAI ILLA PATTATHARI-2
programme.desc: When Raghuvaran, a civil engineer, declines a job offer from Vasundhara, a businesswoman, she makes it her mission to trouble him. However, he takes matters into his own hands to teach her a lesson.

programme.title: Anuman
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: AADUKALAM
programme.desc: Sathya loves her sister like a second mother & believes compassion outweighs all riches. But, Selvanayagi, a woman of pride & privilege, worships money & social status. When their worlds collide, what trials will Sathya face in her fight for justice?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: TOP COOKKU DUPU COOKKU - Season 2 Rpt
programme.desc: Get ready for laughter and culinary chaos! 'Top Cooku Dupe Cooku' is a comedy cookery show where a celebrity top cook teams up with a chef and a dupe cook to execute a culinary challenge. Tune in for a hilarious dose of comedy, food, and fun!

programme.title: Movie - Pannikutty
programme.desc: Desperate for a change of fortune, an ill-fated Utharavathi takes the advice of a seer and chases after Varahi, a piglet, along with his friends. At the same time, Thittani has to safeguard Varahi so as not to jeopardize his impending marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Thambikku Intha Ooru
programme.desc: Akil, a rich youth, runs a restaurant in partnership with his friend Cola Kumar in Singapore. One day, he discovers that he is an orphan and thus embarks on a journey to find his biological parents.

programme.title: Movie - Aadu Puli Aatam (New)
programme.desc: Mandhiran, an orphan, is forced to become a gangster. He kills innocent people, loots them for money and does everything off beam. When he meets Gayathri, he falls in love. Will she wish to be with him after knowing the truth about him?

programme.title: Movie - Selva Magan
programme.desc: The sudden death of a rich woman's son paves way for her relatives to exploit her. She finds a ray of hope in her life after the arrival of Ravi, who vows to protect her.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Vaitheeswaran
programme.desc: A young boy is killed by an aspiring politician. His upset mother tries to kill herself, but a man tells her that her son will be reborn. She waits for her son in a temple for 30 years. This attracts the curiosity of a doctor who offers to treat her.

programme.title: Movie - Gopala Gopala
programme.desc: Gopal causes much angst among his male neighbours as he is friendly with their spouses. They are relieved when he marries Usha. But Usha leaves him after learning that he was married once before.

programme.title: Movie - Marupadiyum
programme.desc: Married to Murali, a film director, Thulasi is shocked to discover her husband having an affair. She finds a new meaning to life after divorcing him, but Murali's life turns otherwise.

programme.title: Movie - Murattu Kaalai
programme.desc: Although Kaalaiyan and his brothers can afford a luxurious lifestyle, they choose to live modestly. However, Sundaravelu is a devious man who tries to grab their land.

programme.title: Movie - Ramana
programme.desc: Ramana, a professor, heads a secret force that eliminates corruption from society. They kidnap 15 most corrupt employees from each government department and kill the most unscrupulous one.

programme.title: Movie - Amarkkalam
programme.desc: A crook is asked by an ex-gang leader to hold the commissioner's daughter captive for two days to ruin the family's honour. While captive, the girl falls in love with the crook, but he rejects her.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 17
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: REVIEW - TUE 09 DEC
programme.desc: Review covers all the action from Matchweek 15, as Aston Villa host Arsenal at Villa Park, Leeds take on Liverpool at Elland Road, and finally to close off the week's fixtures, Wolves versus Manchester United at Molineux Stadium.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 28
programme.desc: We join Regis Le Bris as he charts his meteoric journey from the training pitches of France to the dugout at Sunderland, where he masterminded an unlikely charge to the Premier League. Le Bris reflects on the philosophy and resilience that helped his side punch far above their weight. We also travel back to France to uncover the formative experiences and influences that shaped one of football's most intriguing modern managers.

programme.title: PL RIVALRIES - EP 1
programme.desc: PL Rivalries tells the inside story of classic Premier League match-ups from those who lived and breathed them.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 9
programme.desc: Kevin Phillips remembers the unforgettable 1999/00 season, when he took the Premier League by storm with 30 goals for Sunderland - a tally that made him the top scorer in European football that campaign.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 17
programme.desc: The Catch-Up Show is your chance to relive the 'best bits' from across the Premier League week with a compilation of all PLP content and programming.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Rafal Haratyk
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The final group of 18 competitors advances beyond Stage 1 to face even greater challenges. Will anyone progress all the way to Stage 4 for the first time?

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Luis Collazo for the interim WBC welterweight championship. Collazo injures his hand early on, but has to keep pushing forward.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 - EP 32

programme.desc: When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Keith and Krolia discover troubling details about Lotor

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents "Chance," a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Hufftys not feeling well so his friends try to cheer him up with games but his loud elephant sneezes keep interrupting. Thats until Raa Raa thinks up a way to make his sneezes part of the fun

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends have fun searching the Jingly Jangly Jungle for Hufftys whooshy whooshers.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends hear a strange noise and find a set of tracks in the Jungle but what could be making them

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends come up with lots of different ways to say hello to make one cool greeting.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Raa Raa is waiting for the beautiful Bell Flowers to open but can the fidgety lion sit still long enough to see one

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends try to find things that make funny noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 54
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When King Julien discovers that Maurice is moonlighting as adviser to another king, the two best friends break up.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 78
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Grug thinks his forehead looks too big in Ugga's family portrait, she strives to make the painting disappear.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Tom’s leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder’s home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: When Thunder’s clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 58
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 59
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 60
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 18

The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: I Was Actually There S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: On a hot December day, racial tensions boiled over at Sydney's Cronulla beach. The fuse had been lit a week earlier by an altercation between off-duty lifesavers and men described by police as "of middle eastern appearance".

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Food blogger Jo Whitton joins Helen in the kitchen to share a unique and mouth watering dessert recipe, 'Pumpkin Brownie Pudding with Peanut Butter Caramel Sauce'.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 196
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 248
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, plus Charles Brice with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 248
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across today. Presented by Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 248
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia S34 - EP 38
programme.desc: Costa gives garden bed gifts; Jane explores a florist's paradise; Millie sets up for summer success; Tammy creates beautiful living wreaths; Clarence learns about Christmas beetles; and Hannah meets a family of berry farmers.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Twelve home bakers take part in a bake-off to test their baking skills as they battled to be crowned The Great Australian Bake Off's best amateur baker.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: From flat whites, to avo on toast, Aussie baristas and cooks are sought after all over the world. So how did Australian brekky and brunch's make it big on the world stage?

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 1

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 1
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: Squawk Box Asia - EP 2
programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asia’s business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 1
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: The China Connection - EP 2
programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of China’s economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Inside India - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC’s Inside India gives you news and market commentary on the emerging powerhouse, businesses and people behind its rise. Inside India goes beyond the headlines to give you the edge and insights - this is your gateway to the India story.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 1
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Access Middle East - EP 2
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the world’s most dynamic regions.

programme.title: U.S. Markets Edition - EP 144
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. As global markets become more interconnected, this program ensures audiences in Asia stay informed on major developments shaping the business world overnight.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 1
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition - EP 2
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as European financial centres take the reins of global markets. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe - EP 1
programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Julianna Tatelbaum take on the most complex stories of the day with instant analysis on how you can make your money work around the news.

Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you. Short videos contain facts, interviews with real people, numbers, statistics, everything you need to be aware of recent events in the world and of what is actually going on.

programme.title: Turn Around to Love
programme.desc: This is a family talk show based on the truth, covering age 0-99 years old family issues, chatting easily about various life stories, and discovering love together!

programme.title: True Love Blog
programme.desc: Interviews with famous TV anchor Lulu Hsia. People share personal testimonies of how God carried them through some of the most difficult seasons of life. These lovely Christians are willing to share their darkest and weakest side of their lives to the public in order to bring the most beautiful blessings from heaven to everyone. Each of their witness is with blood and tears, which brought the most shocking transformation and the most profound truth.

programme.title: CTI TALK Online Forum

programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 5
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 22
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2700
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 16
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.desc: The drama tells a story of love and desire during the period of strictest alcohol prohibition in late Joseon era, centering on four youths stepping over the line.

programme.title: Duel on Mount Hua - Eastern Heretic and Western Venom - EP 12
programme.desc: Eastern Heretic and Western Venom - [With English and Chinese subtitles] Set in a reimagined Jin Yong martial arts world, this series is divided into four chapters. Heroes from across the martial world gather at Mount Hua, fiercely competing for the ultimate martial arts supremacy.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2102
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Queen of News Season 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin (Charmaine Sheh), who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with the Gu Zhaohua (Bosco Wong) and Zhang Jiayan (Selena Lee).

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 36
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2102
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 4
programme.desc: Someone assaults Ching-tin. Fortunately, Man-sum turns up and intervenes just in time. Actually, that person is Lai Chau, the father of a gifted child called Lai Ka-ming, who was interviewed many years ago. Lai Chau alleges a news story written by Ching-tin caused his family to break up. Ching-tin feels she has wronged Lai Chau as she reviews the old story, so she wants to make it up to him by helping him locate missing Ka-ming.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 774
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Ye Cheng - EP 6
programme.desc: Shu Cheng (Claire Jia), the daughter of the first aristocratic family, pretends to be a playgirl to conceal her identify. While promoting Shen Ye (Yuan Hao) as a courtesan, she discovers his multiple identities. They have no choice but to work together.

programme.title: Destined - EP 34
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Destined - EP 35
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ru (Song Yi), the daughter of a cloth merchant who’s suffered childhood hardships, is married off to Gu Jiu Si (Bai Jing Ting), the notorious son of Yangzhou's wealthiest family, infamous for his indolent ways. They grow closer despite their differences.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial with Lui Hok-sum as a tainted witness. Tai Cho-fuk scolds him for being ungrateful. Suddenly, gunmen barge into the courtroom. Tai Cho-fuk instantly controls the scene and arrogantly makes fun of everyone. The trio abruptly retaliate against the gunmen.

programme.title: The Queen of News Season 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin (Charmaine Sheh), who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with the Gu Zhaohua (Bosco Wong) and Zhang Jiayan (Selena Lee).

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin (Charmaine Sheh), who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with the Gu Zhaohua (Bosco Wong) and Zhang Jiayan (Selena Lee).

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2101
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: Mother and Mom - EP 8
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The drama depicts the 'worrying' Daechi-dong life of three generations of women, centered on a passionate working mom Jung Eun (Jeon Hye Jin) and her daughter, as they prepare for the entrance test to enter a famous English academy.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 2
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 24
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Always Home - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] This youth campus drama tells the story of a group of children who grew up together in a doctors’ residential apartment. They go through all the important milestones in life together, always supporting one another as they study, work, and pursue their dreams.

programme.title: I Kill U - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Sun Woo, a down-and-out former athlete, is hired to impersonate Ji Yeon, an heiress involved as a driver in a hit-and-run accident. Drawn into dangerous family power struggles, she is trapped between survival and deception.

programme.title: Good Job - EP 3
programme.desc: Eun Seon-Woo (Jung Il-Woo) owns the biggest company in Korea and secretly runs a private detective office. Don Se-Ra (Kwon Yuri) was born with hyperacuity and uses it to help people. As the arrogant and the helpful meet to solve cases together, romance blossoms.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 19
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 8
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 4
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 5
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 16
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.
