programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 14
programme.desc: Hong Kong superstar Leon Lai joins forces with many friends in the entertainment industry to star in the TVB drama "Good Morning Sir," playing a passionate and energetic young teacher who experiences unique challenges in school, family, and relationships.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure - EP 7
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 23
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 24
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Defected, The - EP 14
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the baby's life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three 'Rob-B-Hood' must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Taoist priest Kou is assigned to re-bury a rich man, in the hope that the new tomb will bring further prosperity. When the corpse turns into a vampire and wreaks havoc in the village, his disciples are also hurt by the vampire and possessed by a female ghost respectively. How can Kou save his disciples and hunt down the vampire at the same time?

programme.title: Kill Time
programme.desc: Mak stumbles upon an obscure website "Witch's Zone" when looking for a copy of her dead father's favorite song. The mysterious website only allows one purchase but Mak cannot resist buying one more purple scarf. Not only does the scarf triggers her memories of her father and her first love, it may also be a vital clue in a mysterious murder.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu's family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiance Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan...

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back...

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! programme.desc: Hu's Travel Agency features TV host Hu Gua with his children Hsiao-Chen and Hu Shih-An, running Taiwan's "most human-centered travel agency." Centered in Miaoli, they blend family bonds and local culture to create heartfelt journeys.

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's World News
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's Finance Weekly
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: A Date with The Future - EP 30
programme.desc: From a rescue operation ten years ago to their encounter ten years later, firefighter Jin Shi Chuan (William Chan) and Xu Lai (Zhang Ruo Nan), who's now a journalist and a dog trainer, become partners.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 5 - EP 14

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 3
programme.desc: Ching-tin abruptly turns up at Man-sum’s home. She has contradictory feelings as she sees Sin-mei and Chi-hin getting along like mother and son. Cheung-sing helps Ching-tin open a new social media account for posting messages about hooking up with her old friends so as to let Ching-tin gather more information about her past.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 6
programme.desc: Kwok-wai does not know what to do as he realizes his daughter Tung-tung is missing. Big Ghost receives a call from the kidnapper. He loves money more than anything else. He also claims he has four kids and does not care whether Siu-ho is dead or alive. Kwok-wai is at his wits’ end and resorts to consulting Siu-ho’s mother Ching. Ching ignores Big Ghost’s objection and gives Kwok-wai the money she has raised by herself. Kwok-wai goes to the mall to pay ransom.
